author: epg
msg: Just printing "ERROR: Unrecognized WC format detected" and usage
information isn't very informative, and this is an abuse of
NotImplementedError.  Introduce a new exception class and print the
instead of NotImplementedError, passing format and path.
(LocalException): Add subclass of Exception for local exception
(main): Suppress traceback from all local exceptions, not just
LossyConversion, but add --debug option to suppress the suppression.

author: epg
msg: os.path.walk rather than replacing the local variable 'paths', so
os.path.walk will not walk into children of unversioned directory.

author: glasser
msg: Start to implement the cache for FSFS.
(svn_fs__set_node_origin): New convenience wrapper for setting just
(fs_node_origin_rev): Save the calculated value to the cache (which
is just a stub now).  Rename some variables for clarity.

author: glasser
msg: Start to implement the cache for FSFS.
(fs_node_origin_rev): Check the cache (which is just a stub now)
